This game to me is like Minecraft or World of Warcraft. Born in the 90s I grew up on those games but as I got older the frequency of actually playing is getting lower every year. But I always come back to try out the new expansion for WoW or try the new update for Minecraft. 
It's kind of the same with Dead by Daylight. This is the best multiplayer horror game out there, period. I love how you meet new people almost every day and end up being on their discord and playing more matches together, no matter what language you speak. I've met so many people from around the world through this game and I am thankful for that. The company BHVR has to be one of the most anticipating companies out there when it comes to "community". Thank you for this game!

przepis na bigos: Mięso pokroić w kostkę. Cebulę pokroić w kosteczkę i zeszklić na oleju w dużym garnku. Dodać mięso i dokładnie je obsmażyć.
Wlać 2 szklanki gorącego bulionu lub wody z solą i pieprzem, zagotować. Następnie dodać połamane suszone grzyby, przykryć, zmniejszyć ogień i gotować przez ok. 45 minut.
Dodać listek laurowy, ziela angielskie, kminek, majeranek, powidła śliwkowe lub posiekane śliwki, obrane i pokrojone w kosteczkę obrane jabłko i wymieszać.
Dodać odciśniętą kiszoną kapustę oraz wlać szklankę wody, wymieszać. Przykryć i gotować przez ok. 15 minut.
Kiełbasę obrać ze skóry, pokroić w kostkę i podsmażyć na patelni. Dodać do kapusty i gotować przez ok. 30 minut. Pod koniec dodać koncentrat pomidorowy.
Mąkę podsmażyć na suchej patelni, gdy zacznie brązowieć dodać łyżkę masła i mieszać aż masło się rozpuści.
Trzymając patelnię na ogniu dodać stopniowo kilka łyżek kapusty cały czas mieszając. Przełożyć zawartość patelni z powrotem do garnka, wymieszać i zagotować.
Bon jeu !

This game is quite fun... (With friends) This game is wicked annoying more times than not when playing with randoms. The most annoying thing by far is when a killer camps your hook and prevents anyone from unhooking you. At that point I usually just take my chances (and usually fail) and then fail the skill checks on purpose so I can die quicker. Any killer who plays like this just ruins the game for the survivors. Overall though I do like this game. I'm just nitpicking. This game is really fun when the killer doesn't camp. Though I seriously believe that the devs should implement a better system to detour killers from hook camping.

Игра шедевральная, не понял за что 111 гривен отдал, но мне нравится. Бегают все, дерутся, поднимают на плечи и ласково так на ушко шепчут "п*зда тебе, утырок вонючий". Одна мадам вообще песенку про "укусит за бочок напевает постоянно. В общем, игра заслуживает оскара, гремми и всю другую приблуду в номинации "шляпа года". Спасибо за прочтение данного обзора, надеюсь, он показался содержательным. Не покупайте игру по фулл прайсу.

i rewrote this 50 times because I kept getting too serious about the issues and the bugs and the fact that the entire playerbase is addicted to a point where it's actually bad for their mental health, while also underplaying just how much I genuinely enjoy and like this game, so here:

it's a fun game. like genuinely fun. with a VERY addicting gameplay loop. 

THAT BEING SAID... taking a break from the game is the best thing to renew your interest if you burn yourself out on the frustrations induced by blaming your mistakes on bugs/errors/balancing, which, to be fair... is valid a lot of the times. maybe when you come back, the bugs will be gone and the perks will be balanced!... right??????

The Game:
Press E To Escape

아 술래잡기 재미있다.
사실 이 게임보다 먼저 접한 건 이 게임 라이센스를 사다 만든 파쿠리 모바일 게임이었는데, 그거 하면서 얻은 오해만 아니었어도 더 일찍 사지 않았을까 싶습니다.

아닌가? 그거도 나름 재미있긴 했는데... 근데 뭐 이상하게 정이 안 붙더만. 고어함이 없어서 그랬나.

아무튼 게임 자체는 평균 이상인데, 한국 서버 물이 좀 더러우니까 VPN을 구하든 아마존 서버를 간접차단하든 해서 일본 서버로 건너가시길 바랍니다. 특히 살인마로 입문했으면 그 편이 나음.

아니 그, 뭔가의 악의가 느껴진다고. 게임을 하러 온 게 아니라 직장에서 얻은 스트레스 풀려고 오는 거 같어. 손전등 고문에 판자 기절 넣고 꼭 한번씩 티배깅하는 거나 스팀 프로필 테러 등등... 아니 외국 서버라고 그런 거 아주 안 하는 건 아니지만 이상하게 국내 체감이 심하거든요?

그래도 이런 굵직한 번거로움을 제외하면 내 취향에는 굉장히 잘 맞는 거 같음. 좋다 좋아.
